page.title: 15ENTERTAINMENT-MY SATURDAY
page.content: Because my mum is a cook she sometimes has to prepare food for weddings.The weddings normally take place on a Saturday.My mum gets up at about 6.00 a.m. to prepare the food.She makes sandwiches,buys meats ,makes potato salads (chopped, cooked potatoes with salad cream),rice salads(rice with vegetables).She buys coleslaw,pork pie,pickles,beetroot, tomatoes, lettuce and eggs.She cooks sausage rolls and makes sausages on sticks.Afterwards people can have a variety of cakes,gateaux and trifles.When the food is prepared my mum and I drive to the place where the buffet is held.We unload the food and set it up on tables.When the people arrive it is my job to collect up sherry,wine and champagne glasses.I also collect plates,knifes and forks.I get paid Â£2 to Â£3 for helping.
